thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 16 of 189
thread.title: Alejandro Sandoval

author: Alejandro Sandoval
title: Alejandro Sandoval
text:
Chatted with Azlynn this AM on 2 main concerns in my search for candidates using Ziprecruiter (ZR).
Azlynn was great. Very attentive, informative and seemed to really know her stuff. Not sure if she is a product of knowledge gathered from her veteran status on her team or from outstanding training and having at the ready anticipated answers from common customer questions there at ZR but regardless, you made a believer out of me.
THX!
Alejandro Sandoval
Marine Foods Express.
Director of Ops
